Uses of Class
game.player.Player

  • Packages that use Player 
    Package Description
    game
    Contains all files concerning the gameplay.
    game.ai
    Contains all files concerning AI players.
    game.ai.aiplan
    Contains all files used by the AI to decide what to do.
    game.ai.monopoly
    Contains all files concerning monopoly cards played by the AI.
    game.ai.playertracker
    Contains all files the AI uses to track other players.
    game.board.construction
    Contains all files concerning constructible entities like roads, settlements and cities.
    game.board.construction.localities
    Contains all files concerning localities.
    game.board.construction.roads
    Contains all files concerning roads.
    game.board.edges
    Contains all files concerning edges.
    game.cards.specialcards
    Contains all files concerning special cards.
    game.player
    Contains all files concerning players.
    game.trade
    Contains all files concerning trades.
    game.trade.tradeparticipant
    Contains all files concerning trade participants.
    main
    Contains the main class and all files concerning this program in general.
    network
    Contains all files concerning the communication between client and server.
    network.protocol
    Contains all enums which define the Strings used by the protocol.
    users
    Contains all files concerning users.

    • Uses of Player in game

      Methods in game that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player Game.getActivePlayer()
      Returns the Player whose turn it currently is.
      Player Game.getNextPlayer()
      Returns the Player whose turn it is, if the active player ends their turn.
      Player Game.getPlayerWithId(int id)
      Returns the Player with the specified id.
      Player Game.getPlayerWithMostPointsOtherThan(Player looser)
      Returns the Player who has the most victory points apart from the loosing player.
      Player Game.getPrevousPlayer()
      Returns the Player whose turn it was before the current turn.
      Player Game.searchPlayers(int ID)
      Iterates over the number of Players to look for the one with the stated ID.
      Methods in game that return types with arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      The property wrapping the player whose turn it currently is.

      Returns the Players in this game.

      Getter for the property wrapping the player who won the game.
